favourite.article: The more you try, the stronger He grasps you, Wherever you go, He is there! Oh we will never rest, until we love Him the best, This lovely One—has us in His heart.
Lord Jesus. You never change. You are always fresh and lovely. Thank You for loving Your Body. May Your heart's desire become our heart desire!
This is one of my many favorite hymns. God's heart...how awesome and sweet.
Oh save me Lord, from chasing vanity From selfish dreams, from all that's binding me— There's nothing so high in this universe As giving ourselves—for what's on Your heart.
Oh Lord, I tried many times to leave You but You grasp me with Your strong arm. I love You, Lord.
May all of us be stirred up to rise up for the building of the Lord. This is the only that would give meaning to our lives. PTL.
Oh Lord, stir our hearts..to never depart..to give our all for Christ and the church! Amen.
Hallelujah for we have been marked out before the foundation of the world thus we must be a crazy lover of Him today. Praise The Lord.
